description: Azure Blob Storage - object storage for unstructured data

common_errors.cause: Blob storage authentication or authorization failed
common_errors.solution: Check storage account key or SAS token, verify RBAC roles, check managed identity configuration
Create container with lowercase name, verify container exists before operations

common_errors.cause: Blob does not exist at specified path
common_errors.solution: Verify blob path including virtual directories, check case sensitivity, list blobs to confirm

common_errors.cause: Blob has active lease preventing operation
common_errors.solution: Include lease ID in request headers, break lease if owned, wait for lease to expire
Use larger block sizes, commit blocks more frequently, use Page or Append blob for large files

common_errors.cause: Operation not supported for blob type
common_errors.solution: Use correct API methods for blob type, delete and recreate with correct type
Reduce snapshot frequency, delete old snapshots, implement retry with backoff

common_errors.cause: Immutability policy prevents modification or deletion
common_errors.solution: Wait for retention period to expire, remove legal hold, modify policy if allowed
Verify source blob access, check copy status, ensure destination has write permissions

common_errors.cause: Access tier operation not supported or rehydration required
common_errors.solution: Check account type supports tiers, initiate rehydration for archived blobs, wait for rehydration to complete
